column10: As a pedestrian in the cross walk - I had the white hand signaling that I could walk- a car heading east on North street turned left on to University and in to the crosswalk directly in front of me. I am haunted by this incident.

This intersection has an exclusive pedestrian phase and drivers turning right on red must yield to pedestrians in the crosswalk. Driver turned right on red right after the pedestrian Walk signal was illuminated and pedestrians were beginning to cross.; Exclusive pedestrian signal phase
column34: Work for the city of Fairfax

column10: Failure to yield - right turn must yield to pedestrians in crosswalk.  This did not happen, several cars did not.
